definition: reverse type (white on black)/reversed-out (graphics)/highlighting (of selected text on a computer screen)
contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: Do u know who was that guy in the invert picture?
sentences.chinese: 你能猜到這幅反白相片中的人是誰嗎？

sentences.english: The highlighted symbol is committed, just as it is in completion mode.
sentences.chinese: 這樣就會認可反白顯示的符號，就像完成模式一樣。

sentences.english: In this case, the braces will remain highlighted until the cursor is moved.
sentences.chinese: 在此例中，大括號會保持反白顯示直到移動遊標爲止。

definition: variant of 褪色[tui4 se4]/also pr. [tui4 shai3]
overlapping images/double exposure of photo (e.g. due to fault or motion of camera)/double vision
to be in a poor light/to do sth with one's back to the light/to stand in one's own light
to show signs of anger/to flush with annoyance
